title: eX-Driver the Movie
synopsis: After winning domestic preliminary round, Lisa, Lorna, and Soichi advance to ex-Driver world race competition held in Los Angeles as representative team from Japan. Like a bad omen, they encountered a reckless AI car the first night they arrived at Los Angeles. Although they successfully stopped the car, the local police department is not very happy about that and insists to examine their car overnight.
voices: ['Kobayashi, Yumiko', 'Nagasawa, Miki', 'Asada, Yoko', 'Okiayu, Ryoutarou', 'Nomura, Kenji', 'Mitsuishi, Kotono', 'Miki, Shinichiro', 'Tsukayama, Masane', 'Shimada, Bin', 'Takagi, Wataru']
staff: [['Nishimori, Akira', ['Director']], ['Kameyama, Toshiki', ['Sound Director']], ['Itou, Masumi', ['Music']], ['Miyamae, Mitsuharu', ['Art Director']]]
